functions.tag: {filtered_title: "The Barrier", pages: ["{\"text\":\"The problem was... the End was sealed. I could feel her presence somewhere far beyond the main island. But to reach her, I had to cross something most people didn't even know existed.\\n\\nA Barrier...\"}", "{\"text\":\"IT wasn't made by the Ender Dragon, but it's presence kept it in place.\\n\\nOther's might have for the obvious answer - kill the dragon. Force the way open.\\n\\n\\nBut not me...\"}", "{\"text\":\"I don't hurt things that don't hurt me. The dragon had never attacked me.\\nIt was just there. Guarding its home...\\n\\nAnd maybe I understood that a little too well.\"}"], title: "The Barrier", author: "????", resolved: 1}
